abstract: The second time is the charm for Joel Fagliano.
snippet: The second time is the charm for Joel Fagliano.
lead_paragraph: MONDAY’S PUZZLE — Today’s puzzle will have you seeing double, with six “gaga”-like phrases making up the theme. The repeated syllables mostly all rhyme, with RARA AVIS being the biggest deviant (sounds sinister, doesn’t it?). BABA WAWA finishes things up with a double dose of doubling.
